STAT 386 Final Project: Marvel Movie Data Analysis¶

Colby Eastmond, Quinn Wright, Zack Dalley¶

Movie Data Cleaning Package¶

Install Package via: pip install git+https://github.com/zdalley/stat386_movie_project

Links¶
